title: PES parking (rr)
content: I saw somewhere that we have to pay for parking at PES University,is it true?

comments.body: Why would you pay for parking when you‚Äôre studying there itself?ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
RR is extremely crowded with buildings so they started charging for limited parking space , doesn't work in ec campus cause there is so much place to park.
What about the place near cricket ground?
Idk ask some rr seniors on discord or wait till someone from rr replies I'm a ec campus student
afaik two wheelers is free while 4 wheelers is 50 rupees
two wheeler parking is free, while 4 wheelers have a cost of 50 Rs, not sure, ask on Discord
When we (PES PU Students) had classes in RR Campus, one of my friends used to bring his two wheeler, he said they didn't have any parking charges, but there are parking charges for 4 wheelers
i was asked to pay for a 4 wheeler
4 wheeler we pay 30 rupees in ec campus

Ya that is the place for car and bike parking. There's one bike parking next to front gate as well. Bike parking is free and car parking is ‚Çπ50 as of now, before they used to charge ‚Çπ10 for bike and ‚Çπ30 for car parking. ü§¶
